attributes.action: Sign this petition to get the government to fully fund Air Ambulance service.
attributes.additional_details: With flight times commonly over four times quicker than transfer by road, in many cases, time saved is a life saved, you never know when you will need it.
attributes.background: The Air Ambulance Service deserves improved support from the Government, including direct funding, we want children to grow into adults, we want adults to live longer and we want bereavement through trauma to become rare, let's save more lives by giving the funding that is required.
